quote-text:
Willow: Yeah, you’re the Slayer, and we’re, like, the Slayerettes.
Buffy: I just .. don’t like putting you guys in danger.
Xander: I laugh in the face of danger. Then I hide until it goes away.
———
Giles: Someone doesn’t like cheerleading.
Buffy: Or maybe likes it too much.
Willow: Amy!
Buffy: Amy.
Xander: So you guys are leaning towards Amy.
———
Willow: Amy!
Amy: Get out of my way.
Willow: Wait! I … I need to talk to you, I can help you.
Amy: Help me? With what?
Willow: Well, well, you know, all your witchcraft? I … I know this really good cauldron. Do you actually ride a broom?
quote-source: Buffy the Vampire Slayer, season 1, episode 3: The Witch
